snippet: Noah Syndergaard, Rafael Montero and Cory Mazzoni were sent to Las Vegas, the Mets’ Class AAA minor league affiliate.
abstract: New York Mets, flush with pitchers, send top prospect Noah Syndergaard back to the minor leagues, where he will start the 2014 season at Class AAA Las Vegas; Syndergaard will likely be called back up by midseason if he performs well.
lead_paragraph: Noah Syndergaard, Rafael Montero and Cory Mazzoni were sent to Las Vegas, the Mets’ Class AAA minor league affiliate.

headline.main: Mets Send Syndergaard, a Top Prospect, to the Minors
headline.print_headline: Mets Send Syndergaard, a Top Prospect, to the Minors
